name: Please Hold! (Greg Szypko)
description:
A puzzle game where you take on the role of a telephone switchboard operator. Click and drag cable plugs to connect incoming callers to outgoing lines.

Built for the Game Makers Toolkit 2021 Game Jame, for the theme "Joined Together". The gameplay consists of "joining together" nodes in the switchboard, to the end of "joining together" people trying to make phone calls!

Outside materials used:

Typewriter font: https://www.dafont.com/another-typewriter.font

Typewriter sound: https://freesound.org/people/pakasit21/sounds/138049/

Muffled voice sound: https://freesound.org/people/PuplPndaHimwx/sounds/528615/

Office ambience sound: https://freesound.org/people/Chelly01/sounds/541117/

Jack plug-in sound: https://freesound.org/people/Garuda1982/sounds/558108/
